ValidationRule.description: When the status is changed to Final review for CSO and Technical review for GTO then audit frequency field should be mandatory.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(AND( Record_Type_Name__c ="Solution GTO Technical", text(Status)="Approved" ),AND( Record_Type_Name__c ="Solution CSO Non-Technical",text(Status)="Approved")), ISBLANK(TEXT(Audit_Frequency__c )), ISNULL(Expiration_Date__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please Enter a value for the Audit Frequency
